text: David Alfaro Siqueiros (December 29, 1896 in Camargo, Chihuahua, Mexico - January 6, 1974 in Cuernavaca, Morelos, Mexico) was a famous painter and muralist. He was famous for large public murals using the latest in equipment, materials and technique. == Other websites == *Short biography and some of his artwork *David Alfaro Siqueiros Online - more information and art galleries Category:1896 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Mexican painters Category:Mexican people of Portuguese-Jewish descent
title: David Alfaro Siqueiros
